alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Granville; Vance; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:41PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Vance, southwestern Warren, southeastern Granville and northern Franklin Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 541 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Franklinton, or 10 miles east of Creedmoor, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Louisburg, Franklinton, Kittrell, Youngsville, Centerville, Ingleside, Gillburg and South Henderson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
